main event: A civilian reported seeing an object that appeared as a star moving slowly to the north for approximately 4 minutes in Cedar, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was reported to have been moving slowly in a straight line to the north and appeared to be a star,The object was observed for 4 minutes,The report concluded it may have been a balloon released from Green Bay, Wisconsin,The investigating officer noted the witness was upset during questioning, resulting in brief answers,The report was part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings.
sighted object: an object appearing as a star
